dict.acceptation: (she的物主代词)她的东西；她的家属[有关的人]；

sent.orig: Use mine, yours, his or hers in place of the words in italics.
Remember, her choices are hers and hers alone; she may be on a different page entirely.
sent.trans: 记住，她的选择就是她的，并且只是她一个人的选择而已，也许好朋友已经另有新欢也未可知。

sent.orig: His hands caress hers, hers his.
sent.trans: 他抚摸着她的手，她抚摸着他的。

sent.orig: Hers gentle and soft, hers expression all well the loveliness.
sent.trans: 她的温柔，柔软，她的表现都好。

sent.orig: It was the little ornamental clock, which was hers.
sent.trans: 是只当做摆设的小钟，那是她的东西。
